name: Shivalik Paper
overview:
Established in the year 2008, we, ‘Shivalik Paper And Packaging’, are involved in manufacturing and supplying an impeccable gamut of Laminated, Multi Wall & Kraft Paper Bags. Our range includes BOPP Laminated Paper Bag, HDPE Laminated Kraft Paper Bag, PP Laminated Paper Bag and HDPE Laminated Paper Bag. Along with this, we offer PBOM Paper Bags, Valve Paper Bag, SOM Paper Bag, Valve Type Paper Bag and Stitched Paper Bag.

Our Infrastructure: We have developed a state-of-the-art infrastructure set up at Surat, Gujarat (India) so as to ensure that the business activities related to our offered array of Laminated, Multi Wall & Kraft Paper Bags is carried out in a streamlined manner. Our infrastructure is installed with modern machinery and latest technology that is necessarily required for the manufacturing of offered paper bags.

Our Team: Sales and marketing agents Administrative personnel Procuring agents Warehousing experts Packaging experts Skilled and semi-skilled labor

Our Quality Assurance: Since inception, we have been emphasizing on providing our customer with a qualitative range of Laminated, Multi Wall & Kraft Paper Bags. The entire array of paper bags, which we offer is made using premium quality jute, plastic and other raw material.

Client Satisfaction: We believe in the fact that for the survival of an organization client satisfaction is essential. Keeping same in the mind, we work with a single aim of attaining patron satisfaction. For this, we follow client centric approaches. Under these approaches, we make use of high grade raw material to manufacture offered Laminated, Multi Wall & Kraft Paper Bags, so as to ensure these bags are able to serve patrons for long.
